message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,600,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your position, I'm not willing to go below $1,650,000 for this product. I believe this price still represents a good value for you, considering the benefits it offers.  I'm confident we can reach a mutually agreeable solution.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I've considered your latest offer, but I'm still not able to meet you at $1,650,000. I would like to propose $1,625,000 as a compromise. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.
